title: "VinAI biometric recognition technology for phones works with protective face masks"
excerpt: "VinAI Research has developed a method of facial recognition technology that can accurately identify individuals who wear surgical face masks, the Vingroup-funded research lab announced. Claiming it is one of the first to achieve successful results, the Vietnamese lab said it is making the system available for free, as part of its contribution ..."
